summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6153 for the improvement of 9th Avenue Northwest from West 105th Street to 11th Avenue Northwest; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing a street lighting system and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85986, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
